channel.title: Client v3.2 help
channel.description:
Hi, after about a half an hour of your freaking quiz and registration only to realize I had one before and retrieving it from superslowmotion loading Yahoo email, I can now post this post. I tried to go on a couple servers on I v3.2 moparscape webclient, and it says "Error, click for details" at the top left corner. I clicked, and it opened a window called "Java Console", and I copied and pasted, this is what was inside:
Using JRE version 1.6.0-oem-b104 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Users\amy ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to <n> ----------------------------------------------------
java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1011373133 in class file AppletBot at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1011373133 in class file AppletBot
I'm really getting tired of screwing around on WoW and GTA 4 so I thought I'd stop here, but every time I try something on runescape or moparscape, it fails. Uggh. If you have any idea how to fix this and help me play, it'd be appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Client v3.2 help
item.dc:creator: @manipulator101 manipulator101
item.description:
@manipulator101 wrote:

I’m sorry, I must of not included this, I have no knowledge of what the hell you are saying at all, I’m only 13 years old. I dunno if that’s against the forums rules but I’m just being honest. I mean I have experience with alot of games and commands but not the actual scripting… can you give some specific directions, but if you can’t, that’s alright, thanks for the help.

EDIT: I tried downloading it too, and when it tried to load, it just exits out automatically, like halfway into loading (I already had it installed, I’m talking about trying to run the client). So that’s out too.

Read full topic

item.title: Client v3.2 help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

1011373133 to HEX is 3C 48 54 4D to ASCII is <HTM…

This is the start of a HTML document - This could be the start of a 404 (File not found).
Make sure that the Jar file is uploaded properly and that the main class (AppletBot) is being loaded from the right package.

Read full topic

item.title: Client v3.2 help
item.dc:creator: @manipulator101 manipulator101
item.description:
@manipulator101 wrote:

Hi, after about a half an hour of your freaking quiz and registration only to realize I had one before and retrieving it from superslowmotion loading Yahoo email, I can now post this post. I tried to go on a couple servers on I v3.2 moparscape webclient, and it says “Error, click for details” at the top left corner. I clicked, and it opened a window called “Java Console”, and I copied and pasted, this is what was inside:

Using JRE version 1.6.0-oem-b104 Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = C:\Users\amy

c: clear console window
f: finalize objects on finalization queue
g: garbage collect
h: display this help message
l: dump classloader list
m: print memory usage
o: trigger logging
q: hide console
r: reload policy configuration
s: dump system and deployment properties
t: dump thread list
v: dump thread stack
x: clear classloader cache
0-5: set trace level to

java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1011373133 in class file AppletBot
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1011373133 in class file AppletBot

I’m really getting tired of screwing around on WoW and GTA 4 so I thought I’d stop here, but every time I try something on runescape or moparscape, it fails. Uggh.
If you have any idea how to fix this and help me play, it’d be appreciated. Thanks.

Read full topic
